summary: "My verdict is : I, Olga Hepnarová, the victim of your bestiality, sentence you to death penalty." Those were the famous words of the 22-year-old mass murderer Olga Hepnarová, who in 1973 drove a truck into a group of innocent people in Prague.
cast: Michalina Olszanska|Martin Pechlát|Klára Melísková|Marika Soposká|Juraj Nvota|Martin Finger|Marta Mazurek|Ondrej Malý|Petra Nesvacilová|Ivan Palúch|Gabriela Mícová|Zuzana Stavná|Jan Novotny|Viktor Vrabec|Malwina Turek|Roman Zach|Lukás Bech|Magdaléna Borová|Martina Eliásová|Pavel Neskudla|Cestmír Kozar|Tereza Blazková|Malgorzata Gorol|Zofia Graziewicz|Miroslaw Haniszewski|Marcin Kalisz|Tomás Kollárik|Damian Kret|Marta Malikowska|Wioletta Mlynarczyk|Lena Schimscheiner|Natalia Sikora|Szymon Piotr Warszawski|Tomasz Wlosok|Blazej Wójcik
keywords: female psychopath|full frontal female nudity|lesbian sex scene|oral sex|death penalty
title: Yo, Olga Hepnarová
